TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Utilities extends System.Object
public ref class Utilities abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Contains utility methods used by MSBuild. This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string Escape(string unescapedExpression) cil managed
Public Shared Function Escape (unescapedExpression As String) As String

Docs.summary: Converts the specified string into a syntax that allows the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] engine to interpret the character literally.
Docs.returns: The converted value of the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Alcuni caratteri hanno un significato particolare nei file di progetto [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)]. Tra gli esempi di carattere sono inclusi il punto e virgola (;) e l'asterisco (*). Per utilizzare questi caratteri speciali come valori letterali, Ã¨ necessario specificare con la sintassi % nn, dove nn rappresenta il valore esadecimale ASCII del carattere. Questo metodo esegue la conversione.
